1362230.name: Bubble Bounce Demo
1362230.description:
See if bouncing off logs, fences, and anything else you can find it right for you in the Bubble Bounce demo. Thanks to this playable demo, you can find out if this game is right for you without taking any risks!

The Bubble Bounce demo includes:

-2 levels from the full game!
-Four player multiplayer (local only).

And that's it! I mean, it's free. The demo features two neat levels, and the same fantastic gameplay you'll find in the full game!
